overview: N.N. Sangesh - Chief Operating Officer Sangesh is a member of our board of directors since Sep 2010 and Chief Operating Officer (COO) of Blue Genie Technologies. He has completed his Masters in Management and Systems from Madurai Kamaraj University and Master in Human Resource Management from Annamalai University.
